channel.title: Registering server
channel.description: ok. i did everything on this to create a server http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=329010.0;wap2 and nothings working........... well, it works by using my default gateway to login and people can join but its not allowing me to use the ip i created at no-ip.com the ip was goldendragon.no-ip.biz all i want to do is add it to the list of servers so people can see it and play on it and know that its there it keeps saying its offline please help!!!!! btw im using a wireless router...which is linksys and i downloaded the source i wanted to please help if you could that would be great thanks

item.title: Registering server
item.dc:creator: @im_0nlyy im 0nlyy
item.description:
@im_0nlyy wrote:

oh… so you 100% sure itll work?? im pretty sure i portforwarded… what do i login with? and what do you mean keep no-ip.org up??? u mean the duc with my ip in it? my duc ip is tacticalpkzz.no-ip.org try to login to it… but why when i log into 127.0.0.1 it freeses and dont do anything? but it says loading please wait

Read full topic

item.title: Registering server
item.dc:creator: @tw33zy tw33zy
item.description:
@tw33zy wrote:

nope, just keep run server n no-ip.org up, you could log out if you wanted to… lol

Read full topic

item.title: Registering server
item.dc:creator: @im_0nlyy im 0nlyy
item.description:
@im_0nlyy wrote:

24 hours exactly? yeah okay. after that it will be online what if my screensaver goes up will it interupt it??? do i have to stay logged into the server all times? everytime i want to make it up what if i wanna make it 24/7?

Read full topic

item.title: Registering server
item.dc:creator: @tw33zy tw33zy
item.description:
@tw33zy wrote:

keep your runserver up, and your no-ip.org up.

Read full topic

item.title: Registering server
item.dc:creator: @im_0nlyy im 0nlyy
item.description:
@im_0nlyy wrote:

alright… so how to i keep it online?? do i have to sign in on the server for 24 hours or what??? again. it does not use my ip i put for duc!!! it says error connecting to server i tried to portforward and everything

Read full topic

item.title: Registering server
item.dc:creator: @twins twins
item.description:
@twins wrote:

so go to serverstatus and make sure your server is ONLINE and then register it and it has to be online for like 24 hours.

Read full topic

item.title: Registering server
item.dc:creator: @im_0nlyy im 0nlyy
item.description:
@im_0nlyy wrote:

ok. i did everything on this to create a server http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=329010.0;wap2 and nothings working… well, it works by using my default gateway to login and people can join but its not allowing me to use the ip i created at no-ip.com the ip was goldendragon.no-ip.biz all i want to do is add it to the list of servers so people can see it and play on it and know that its there it keeps saying its offline please help!!! btw im using a wireless router…which is linksys and i downloaded the source i wanted to please help if you could that would be great thanks

Read full topic
